comment.author: 26105073@N03
comment._content:
The crew of the U.S. Navy aircraft carrier USS Leyte (CV-32) spellS out the name of the ship at an unidentified location. Note the Grumman F9F-2 Panthers of fighter squadron VF-31 Tomcatters positioned on the after end of the flight deck. Date 1950-52 - Source -  
U.S. Navy National Museum of Naval Aviation photo No. 1999.272.027
